text: The Group B of the 2015 Copa América was one of the three groups of competing nations in the 2015 Copa América. It consisted of Argentina, Uruguay (title holders), Paraguay, and Jamaica (invited team). Group play began on 13 June 2015 and ended on 20 June 2015. Argentina, Paraguay and Uruguay advanced to the quarter-finals. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:left;" |- !rowspan=2| Draw position !rowspan=2| Team !rowspan=2| Appearance !rowspan=2| Previous best performance !colspan=2| FIFA Rankings |- ! | || data-sort-value="1" | 1st || data-sort-value="0.00" | Debut || 113 || 65 |} ;Notes ==Standings== In the quarter-finals: *Argentina advanced to play Colombia (third-placed team of Group C). *Paraguay advanced to play Brazil (winners of Group C). *Uruguay (as one of the two best third-placed teams) advanced to play Chile (winners of Group A). ==Matches== All times local, CLT (UTC−3).
